commitResults.messageTitle: Add constructor, and greet and farewell dialogues
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added constructor to initialise Red Girl
- Added printBootSequence() to mimic Nier Automata's boot effect
- Added greet() to display a greeting message
- Added exit() to display a farewell message

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Echo functionality and improve existing code
commitResults.messageBody:
- Added initRedGirl function
- Added more dialogue and with colour
- Renamed greet and exit functions to more intuitive names printGreeting and printFarewell
- Edited README to include Chatbot description

commitResults.messageTitle: Add addListEntry and printList functions
commitResults.messageBody:
- printList function added, along with ArrayList to store strings to be printed
- addListEntry function takes in string input to be directly added to the list
- Adjusted Scanner to scan each line rather than each token, using sc.nextLine() instead of sc.next(), in order to work with addListEntry. This is done because each entry may consist of multiple words.
- Adopted the SE-EDU Java coding standard into my code

commitResults.messageTitle: Add Task class
commitResults.messageBody:
Task contains a String description and a boolean isDone.
It has a constructor that takes in a String description parameter, as well as setting isDone to false by default.
getStatusIcon() creates a visual for its "done" status.
setAsDone() and setAsUndone are setter functions that sets the isDone variable to true and false respectively.
Overrode the default Object.toString() so that the Task instances displays completion status and task description / name.
Changed the ArrayList type in RedGirl from String to Task.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add convertToRedGirlTheme
commitResults.messageBody:
Function that converts dialogue text colour into dark red.
Intention is to reduce redundancy in the print functions when the darkRed and reset strings are added to the front and back of the dialogue respectively.
This essentially makes all print functions less abstract, promoting SLAP principles

commitResults.messageTitle: Add markListEntry and unmarkListEntry
commitResults.messageBody: These two functions take in a task index and marks or unmarks the task as complete accordingly, printing a unique dialogue for each.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update RedGirl.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Added redGirlPrint() that uses convertToRedGirlTheme(), which reduces more redundancy in the code when printing each of the bot's dialogues

Added handleMarkInput's functionality
- It handles edge cases such as wrong number of arguments and invalid index
- After edge case checks, it marks and unmarks accordingly

Modified initRedGirl's condition for the mark and unmark commands
- conditions now search for "mark " and "unmark " with a space behind, ensuring that it is the actual command and not a task named "marking homework" or "marker"

commitResults.messageTitle: Add parseInput()
commitResults.messageBody:
Added parseInput to take in string inputs, reducing the abstraction level in initRedGirl

Fixed some coding standards that were missed

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for Todo and Deadline tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduced TodoTask and DeadlineTask classes extending Task, which is now abstract.
Updated RedGirl to handle adding and displaying both todo and deadline tasks, including parsing input and printing appropriate messages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add EventTask and refactor task handling
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduced the EventTask class to represent events with start and end times
Updated RedGirl to handle event task input, refactored task addition logic to use a common addTask method, and improved user feedback messages
Also added a getTaskCount method and enhanced list printing for empty task lists

commitResults.messageTitle: Update EventTask.java
Fix missed coding standards
Update DeadlineTask.java
commitResults.messageBody: Added getter function for deadline

commitResults.messageTitle: Add todo input handler and default echo
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduced handleTodoTaskInput to process 'todo' commands with validation.
Added echo method for unrecognized input, replacing the previous default behaviour of adding a todo entry.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add text ui testing
commitResults.messageBody: Added input and corresponding expected txt files to test for the correctness of the output of the commands todo, deadline, event and exit

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename chatbot to Red Girls
commitResults.messageBody: Changed the description of the README to fit the name change

commitResults.messageTitle: Add custom Red Girls exception class
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduced RedGirlsException class to encapsulate custom error messages with themed output.
Also renamed the convertToRedGirlTheme to toRedGirlsString, which is more intuitive and reminiscent of the original toString function

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor input handling to use exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
Replaces in-method error messages with custom RedGirlsException throws for invalid input cases in task handling methods.
Adds new exception types and updates method signatures to declare thrown exceptions, improving error handling and code clarity.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch-Level-5
Refactor package structure and add Parser
commitResults.messageBody:
Moved Task-related classes to the 'purpose' package and RedGirlsException to the 'intellect' package.
Updated imports in RedGirls.java accordingly.
Added a new Parser class (empty for now) in the 'intellect' package to prepare for future parsing logic.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor task management into TaskList class
commitResults.messageBody:
Moved all task-related logic from RedGirls.java into a new purpose.TaskList class to improve code organization and separation of concerns.
RedGirls now delegates task operations to TaskList, simplifying its responsibilities.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor input parsing logic into Parser class
commitResults.messageBody: Moved input parsing and task handling methods from RedGirls to a new Parser class for better separation of concerns. RedGirls now delegates input parsing to Parser, which manages task operations using the provided TaskList.

commitResults.messageTitle: Handle RedGirlsException within parseInput method
commitResults.messageBody: Wrapped the command parsing logic in a try-catch block to catch RedGirlsException and print its message, preventing exceptions from crashing the entire program every time.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor dialogue methods into Dialogue class
commitResults.messageBody:
Moved all dialogue-related methods from RedGirls.java to a new charisma.Dialogue class for better separation of concerns and code organization.
Updated RedGirls to use the new Dialogue class.
Also removed unnecessary exception from Parser.parseInput signature.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command parsing to use switch statement
commitResults.messageBody: Replaces multiple if-else statements with a switch-case structure for parsing user commands. This improves readability and maintainability of the parseInput method.

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor TaskList to use static methods and fields
commitResults.messageBody:
TaskList methods and the tasks list are now static, removing the need to instantiate TaskList.
Updated Parser and RedGirls to use the new static TaskList.
Added abstract Command class and a placeholder TodoCommand for future command pattern implementation.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add todo, deadline and event commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduces TodoCommand, DeadlineCommand and EventCommand classes to handle creation and addition of todo, deadline and event tasks respectively.
Each command is now responsible for picking apart the inputs, creating the tasks and adding it to the static TaskList.

commitResults.messageTitle: Clean up old task input handling functions
commitResults.messageBody: Removed the old functions in Parser and TaskList that got replaced.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add MarkCommand for task mark and unmarking
commitResults.messageBody: Created MarkCommand class that extends Command to take the responsibility of handling mark input

commitResults.messageTitle: Move all packages into one main package
commitResults.messageBody: Created the main package redgirls which contains all the packages intellect, commands, charisma and purpose

commitResults.messageTitle: Add ListCommand
commitResults.messageBody: Created ListCommand for handling printing the task list

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor command parsing
commitResults.messageBody:
Parser's parseInput now returns a Command instead of executing the command itself, reducing its responsibility and promoting better SRP
Command is executed in RedGirls.java instead
Made the switch case more succinct using lamda style

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch-A-Packages
Update README.md
Change Command execute function to return bool
commitResults.messageBody:
Introduced ByeCommand to handle program termination, replacing direct 'bye' string checks in RedGirls.java.
Parser now handles the interpretation of all commands, while RedGirls.java only handles the execution of commands.
Updated Command abstract class to make execute function return a boolean. I originally intended to have ByeCommand call System.exit(0) to quit the app when the command was executed. However, I found making the execute() a boolean return type to be checked by RedGirls.java cleaner.

commitResults.messageTitle: Add HelpCommand to display command list
commitResults.messageBody: Added HelpCommand to list all the commands and their descriptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Rename package from redgirls to n2
commitResults.messageBody: All Java source files have been moved from the 'redgirls' package to the 'n2' package

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor boot delay to use constant
commitResults.messageBody: Introduced a static final BOOT_DELAY_MS constant to replace the hardcoded boot delay value in the Dialogue class. This improves maintainability and makes it easier to adjust the delay in the future.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update TaskList.java
